Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the demo for <BLUE>"STORY OF
SEASONS."</BLUE>
<PAGE>
I'm Elise. I run a big farm in this town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SPECIAL>Come on, let me show you around. You can
thank me later!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hello! I'm Fritz. I'm a farmer, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you want to know anything about basic
controls, just say the word!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Now, then, rather than just playing tour guide,
how about I give you some <RED>jobs</RED> to do?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Let's get started! If you finish a job and want to
move on to the next one, just come talk to me.
Got it?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is <BLUE>your house</BLUE>. You can take a rest on the
bed, change your clothes, and so on. It's like
your home base...your castle!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the <BLUE>Safari</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
It's like a wild animal paradise. You'll find all
manner of crazy critters here!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the <BLUE>Trade Depot</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Merchants come to this town from all over the
world, and this is where you can show your
appreciation by sending stuff back.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your first job is to <GREEN>harvest some crops</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SPECIAL>Go harvest crops from that field down in the
lower right.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The next job is to <GREEN>take care of some animals</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SPECIAL>Go brush the animals in the lower left part of the
farm.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ready for this? Your next job is...dun dun
DUNNNN...to <GREEN>change clothes</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SPECIAL>Go check the closet in the back and put some
fresh clothes on. You stink!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The next job is to <GREEN>communicate with animals</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
Go to the Safari and chat with the animals there.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've got another job for you: <GREEN>shipping items</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
Ship your items to a trader. That's it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your next two jobs will be to <GREEN>harvest crops</GREEN> and
to <GREEN>take care of some animals</GREEN>!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>Hey, where are you going?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>If there's anything you don't understand, I can
teach you! What do you want to know?
How to harvest crops
How to brush animals
How to change clothes
How to communicate with animals
How to ship items

<CANCEL_SELECT>
I'm good!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tsk, tsk... Seems you haven't finished the job
yet! There are still <GREEN>crops to harvest</GREEN>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tsk, tsk... Seems you haven't finished the job
yet! There are still <GREEN>animals to take care of</GREEN>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tsk, tsk... Seems you haven't finished the job
yet! You still need to <GREEN>change out of those ratty
clothes</GREEN>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tsk, tsk... Seems you haven't finished the job
yet! The animals tell me you still haven't
<GREEN>communicated with them</GREEN>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tsk, tsk... Seems you haven't finished the job
yet! There are still <GREEN>items left to ship</GREEN>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Tsk, tsk... Seems you haven't finished the job
yet! There are still <GREEN>crops to harvest</GREEN> and <GREEN>animals
to take care of</GREEN>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do whatever you'd like. Move on to the next job,
or just play around freely.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've finished every job we had for you! Please
do whatever you'd like now until time runs out.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>Would you like to move on to the next job?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>Where would you like me to take you?
I want to move on!

<CANCEL_SELECT>
I want to stay here for now.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Well done! You've finished <GREEN>harvesting those
crops</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Wow! You finished a job, huh? That's great!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Well done! You've finished <GREEN>taking care of those
animals</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Wow! You finished a job, huh? That's great!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Well done! You've finished <GREEN>changing your
clothes</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Wow! You finished a job, huh? That's great!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Well done! You've <GREEN>communicated with animals</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Wow! You finished a job, huh? That's great!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Well done! You've <GREEN>successfully shipped stuff</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Wow! You finished a job, huh? That's great!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
And that was the last job...which means you've
now done everything you had to do! Nice job!
♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH><WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Awesome! You're brilliant! Congratulations!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Since you finished all the jobs, you can do
whatever you'd like now until time runs out.
<PAGE>
If you come talk to me, I can take you to other
places around here.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When crops bloom or ripen, you can harvest
them by pressing the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Are you ready? Get in that field and press the <BLUE>A
Button</BLUE>! Go on! Give it a shot!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Press the <BLUE>R Button</BLUE> and select a brush to equip
it.
<PAGE>
Once you've got a brush equipped, press and
hold the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to brush an animal!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let's do it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to change your clothes, press the <BLUE>A
Button</BLUE> in front of the closet and select <RED>"Change
Clothes."</RED>
<PAGE>
You can change your hairstyle and hair color,
too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let's do it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to communicate with animals, get
close to them and press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If it's small, you can lift it up, too. Then press
the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> one more time to set it down.
<PAGE>
Let's give it a try!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Talk to a trader and select <RED>Ship Items</RED> to ship
what you've got.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let's do it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. Let's move on.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, okay. I'll be waiting here, then.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You finished the job here, so let's move on to
the next one!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I have nothing left to teach you. Please feel free
to do whatever you'd like until time runs out.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Gotcha. Enjoy the job!
Go to the Highland Farm Area
Go back to My House
Go to the Safari
Go to the Trade Depot

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the <BLUE>Highland Farm Area</BLUE>. You can do
whatever you want here.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is <BLUE>Your House</BLUE>. You can do whatever you
want here.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the <BLUE>Safari</BLUE>. You can do whatever you
want here.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the <BLUE>Trade Depot</BLUE>. You can do whatever
you want here.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Since you're still holding an animal, you can't
move on to your next job.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to set it down, then talk to
me again.
